name: photovoltaics, electric installation for 570kWp module, open ground | photovoltaics, electric installation for 570kWp module, open ground | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1300/documentation

This dataset represents the production of different components of the electric installation for a 570 kWp photovoltaic power plant namely the fuse box, electric cables, and the electric meter. There is no lighthning protection taken into account. The inverter is modelled in a separate dataset.  

This dataset starts from the purchase of the needed components for the photovoltaic electric installation. 

This dataset includes all installations between the panel and the grid, but not the inverter. Process data of the electric equipment include construction materials and wire drawing. The energy use for the manufacturing of the electric installations is only considered with a copper wire drawing process. This dataset includes materials and packaging for the production of cabling and fuse bux. Metal processing is modeled with estimations. The disposal of the product after use is included.

This dataset doesn't include the inverter.
category: F:Construction/43:Specialized construction activities/439:Other specialized construction activities/4390:Other specialized construction activities

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Electric installation for an open ground 570 kWp photovoltaic plant. No specifications available on cable lengths and further details.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The electric installation was scaled from a small 3kWp PV power plant  by adjusting the length of the lightning protection, the length of the cabling, and the weight of the fuse box.

exchanges.description: EcoSpold01Location=ES
